desc: Superhero glasses for real people. 32°N sunglasses, equipped with liquid crystal technology lenses, dynamically correct vision impairment. They address presbyopia, and mimic natural human vision without the difficulty of progressive and bifocals, allowing seamless switch between near vision far distances

layout.text:
SUNGLASSES
THAT SWITCH TO
READING GLASSES
WITH ONE SWIPE
The first (and only) adaptive focus sunglasses.
